2daa8866-4178-42a1-857a-51fe1d188848.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated awareness of the core issues surrounding human trafficking. Earners are ready to make a true and lasting difference—to be part of the solution to end human trafficking right now, leveraging exactly who they are and where they are today to make an impact.
2daa8866-4178-42a1-857a-51fe1d188848.name: Justice U Human Trafficking Awareness Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Justice U™ online course Human Trafficking Awareness. The course takes approximately 1 hour to complete.
Successfully complete the course final exam with a score of 80% or higher. The exam has 25 questions based on the course learning objectives. Learners are allowed 3 attempts total.

1e515e81-5586-4251-a7e7-b6e27331a258.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge about effective strategies to end human trafficking. Earners understands new frameworks and a strategic approach that will become an essential guide for their actions—as an individual or as an entire community.
1e515e81-5586-4251-a7e7-b6e27331a258.name: Justice U Strategy to End Human Trafficking Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Justice U™ online course Strategy to End Human Trafficking. The course takes approximately 2 hours to complete.
Successfully complete the course final exam with a score of 80% or higher. The exam has 25 questions based on the course learning objectives. Learners are allowed 3 attempts total.

368fbf62-3d80-4ed2-a234-27103bbc8508.description: Earners of this Certification have completed a three-part series with demonstrated knowledge in human trafficking awareness, community strategies to end human trafficking, and defining a personalized unique role in the movement to end human trafficking.
368fbf62-3d80-4ed2-a234-27103bbc8508.name: Justice U Human Trafficking Awareness and Strategy Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete all three online courses in the  Justice U™ Learn How to End Human Trafficking Series . Combined, the courses take 4-6 hours to complete.
Justice U Human Trafficking Awareness Badge
Justice U Strategy to End Human Trafficking Badge
Justice U My Role to End Human Trafficking Badge

11499b22-af12-4c76-9913-a1986597bff8.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated knowledge of how an individual can recognize and implement his or her unique role in the movement to end human trafficking. 11499b22-af12-4c76-9913-a1986597bff8.name: Justice U My Role to End Human Trafficking Badge

skills.name: Advocacy With Children And Young People

df2368af-0b35-4d68-a5e3-e4c3963597bb.description: Earners of this Microbadge can describe the connections between the COVID-19 pandemic's impact and increasing risk factors for human trafficking. Earners can recognize key rise and compounding vulnerabilities related to the COVID-19 pandemic and can also describe tangible ways to engage in efforts that strengthen communities and contribute to the end of human trafficking.
df2368af-0b35-4d68-a5e3-e4c3963597bb.name: Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on Human Trafficking Microbadge

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Justice U™ online course The Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on Human Trafficking (15-20  minutes).
Successfully complete the course final exam with a score of 80% or higher. The exam has 10 questions based on the course learning objectives. Learners are allowed 3 attempts total.

7fcc3ca2-577a-423a-937e-d868342d8d1e.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the overall health impact of human trafficking. Earners are able to identify physical and mental health conditions associated with human trafficking, how substance use and abuse affect health impact related to human trafficking, how age and stage of development relate to the health impact of trafficking, and how barriers to health care affect the health impact of human trafficking.
7fcc3ca2-577a-423a-937e-d868342d8d1e.name: Justice U Healthcare Series: Human Trafficking Health Impact Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Justice U™ online course Health Impact of Human Trafficking. The course takes approximately 1.5 hours to complete.
Successfully complete the course final exam with a score of 80% or higher. The exam has 25 questions based on the course learning objectives. Learners are allowed 3 attempts total.

073c0940-6066-4a98-bbae-fb2af0f11a59.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of recommended ways to identify and assess for human trafficking. Earners are able to recognize potential indicators of human trafficking, identify appropriate screening options, describe factors important to identification during a physical exam, and consider the balance of documentation with privacy and confidentiality to the benefit of the patient.
073c0940-6066-4a98-bbae-fb2af0f11a59.name: Justice U Healthcare Series: Human Trafficking Identification & Assessment in Healthcare Badge

eae497c1-773b-4233-80b1-5db0b2df3f46.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of why human trafficking protocols are critical in healthcare organizations and settings. They can describe the key components and details that such protocols should encompass. Earners can also describe why patient-centric approaches, such as trauma-informed care. should be included in protocols. Finally, earners of this badge have practice with analyzing practices and protocols within their own facility, for opportunity to improve.

7f18bc82-1180-4150-aa19-50c72626ef5a.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their ability to effectively make an impact toward ending human trafficking by activating their business network to get educated, build awareness, and take action. Earners must have shown quantifiable progress for all three commitments from the AFRJ’s Business Pledge to End Human Trafficking, working with their AFRJ Business for Good Coach. Earners of this badge are now certified to champion business for good efforts on a range of social justice issues.
7f18bc82-1180-4150-aa19-50c72626ef5a.name: Business for Good Champion Badge (AFRJ & Justice U)

badge_template_activities.title: Fulfill all three commitments from the AFRJ’s Business Pledge to End Human Trafficking, with the steps you developed in your Action Plan to get educated, build awareness, and take action.
Increase awareness of the reality of human trafficking and the opportunities to end it in your organization and network
Make a quantifiable difference by taking action in your local community alongside colleagues and community partners to end human trafficking and support vulnerable individuals
Work with your AFRJ Coach to track and celebrate your work along the way.

121480c2-a203-48b3-a999-66348d05b69f.description: Earners of this badge have created art or content based on an educational experience with Justice U and/or Engage Together for the purposes of ending human trafficking and protecting the vulnerable. Examples include: social media, digital or print content, custom presentations, research papers, resources, student projects, and other artistic expressions. Citations and credits are required. *This badge is awarded directly by organization leadership, following review and approval.*
121480c2-a203-48b3-a999-66348d05b69f.name: Maker Badge (Justice U & Engage Together)

badge_template_activities.title: Create art, content, or a project based on an educational experience with Justice U and/or Engage Together for the purposes of ending human trafficking and protecting the vulnerable.
Organization leadership review and approval. Citations and credits are required.

3f92405d-659f-4aa5-9b6b-efb357ea3e2a.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their ability to effectively advocate for progress toward ending human trafficking, and have developed a thorough understanding of how the business community is uniquely positioned come alongside government and community efforts to make an impact.
3f92405d-659f-4aa5-9b6b-efb357ea3e2a.name: Business for Good Advocate Badge (AFRJ & Justice U)

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the Human Trafficking Awareness & Strategy Certification.
Review the Action Plan you created in third course of the Learn How to End Human Trafficking Series with an AFRJ Coach and determine your next best steps.
With your Coach, develop and review an actionable plan for how your business can make a quantifiable impact in your local community, industry, or beyond to end and prevent trafficking.

c6ca9a9d-6031-456d-967d-4a4a888ccb66.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their ability to effectively coach other business professionals toward action that helps address human trafficking and protect vulnerable populations. Earners of this badge have proven their commitment to the cause of leveraging business as a force for good by actively serving for at least one year on the AFRJ Freedom Council, alongside an assembly of business leaders dedicated to this cause.
c6ca9a9d-6031-456d-967d-4a4a888ccb66.name: Business for Good Coach Badge (AFRJ & Justice U)

badge_template_activities.title: Join the AFRJ Freedom Council, an assembly of business leadersdedicated to ending human trafficking – together. Remain active in service for one year and receive ongoing training with AFRJ.
Continue mobilizing your business network to make an evergrowing impact in your local community. Catalyze and coach new business leaders to join the fight.
Support 1 or more projects to end human trafficking in the United States and around the world.
